dct_title_s: Tunes, oppidum barbarie & regia sedes : anno 1535. cum à Carolo V. Imp. expugnaretur
dct_description_sm: Pictorial views of Tunis in 1535, Mahdia in 1540, and Peñon de Veles in 1564, under siege by the forces of Emperor Charles V. From: Civitates orbis terrarum. Cologne : Braun and Hogenberg, 1572-1618. German text on verso.
dct_subject_sm: Peñón de Vélez de la Gomera (Spain)—Maps
